attributes.action: Introduce overseas travel bans for all convicted sex offenders
attributes.additional_details: It is known that many Paedophiles travel outside of the UK where sex of children can easily be purchased and upon a sex offender being convicted in the UK if the government were to prevent that person leaving the UK it would reduce children being abused outside of the UK.
attributes.background: As the victim of a Paedophile in my youth and seeing many cases now brought to justice, I believe that stopping convicted sex offenders from travelling to other countries where child sex can be bought would prevent many offences.
